#summary The Software Dependencies required to build the BDRS

= Introduction =
The BDRS has a number of software dependencies in order to build and run it in a development environment. At the very minimum, you will require maven2, postgresql and postgis.

= Details =
In Ubuntu you can simply apt-get install the following dependencies:

{{{
sudo apt-get install maven2
sudo apt-get install postgresql
sudo apt-get install postgresql-8.4-postgis
}}}

Under OpenSuSE add the following repository: `http://download.opensuse.org/repositories/Application:/Geo/openSUSE_11.3/`

and use Yast to install:
{{{
maven2
postgresql-server
postgresql-devel
postgis
postgis-utils
}}}
